fn.p: Author contributions B.M., H.-W.C., F.U.R. and M.V. conceived the concept. N.P.P. and M.V. initiated the graphene-SFA effort. Q.H. prepared the mica, gold, and the iridium disks. H.F.G. deposited and characterized graphene on the iridium disks. SFA-measurements were performed by B.M. and H.-W.C. All the authors discussed and co-wrote the whole paper.
